html.p: The door has been left ajar. You overhear snatches of conversation: one man saying to another, '...berthing today. Stop him and the fool won't know where to go. It must be done.' You realize they are referring to a ship that is about to arrive. If you decide to check new arrivals at the docks, click here. If you want to go on eavesdropping, click here. If you prefer to enter the shop, click here.
